page.title: 07RELIGION IN DOBWALLS AREA
page.content: BOTH DOBWALLS AND TREVELMOND HAVE A METHODIST CHAPEL.THEY SHARE A MINISTER WITH 7 OTHER CHAPELS. BOTH CHAPELS HAVE A SUNDAY SCHOOL AND 2 SUNDAY SERVICES. THERE IS AN ANGLICAN CHURCH AT DOBWALLS AND ANOTHER JUST OUTSIDE TREVELMOND AT ST.PINNOCK. THESE ARE SERVED BY CLERGY FROM THE LISKEARD TEAM MINISTRY. RELATIONS BETWEEN CHURCH AND CHAPEL HAVE TRADITIONALLY BEEN BAD,BUT HAVE IMPROVED MARKEDLY.ALL THE CLERGY MEET TOGETHER WEEKLY.IN DOBWALLS ALL CHURCH MIDWEEK MEETINGS ARE NOW JOINT. IT IS THE AIM OF THE CLERGY TO HAVE A JOINT CHURCH IN DOBWALLS. TEETOTALISM IS STRONG IN THE AREA & THIS HAS CAUSED SOME FRICTION WITH THE LOCAL COMMUNITY.NOW THE CHURCHES ARE TRYING HARD TO BUILD UP THE SENSE OF COMMUNITY IN A CHANGING AREA.
